grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| filter contains(log, "tracepoint")
grail.query:
fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| filter  contains( log,"tracepoint")

input.value:
fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| filter  contains( log,"tracepoint")

fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| parse log, "JSON:json_log"
| fieldsAdd process_kprobe=json_log[process_kprobe]
| fieldsAdd process=process_kprobe[process]
| fieldsAdd parent=process_kprobe[parent]
| fieldsAdd pod=process[pod]
| fieldsAdd namespace=pod[namespace]
| fieldsAdd podname=pod[name]
| fieldsAdd containers=pod[container]
| fieldsAdd containername=containers[name]
| fieldsAdd workload_kjnd=pod[workload_kind]
| fieldsRemove pod,containers
| fieldsAdd binary=process[binary] , bianryp=parent[binary]
| fieldsAdd arguments=process[arguments], parguments=parent[arguments]
| fieldsAdd process_execute=concat(binary,arguments), parent_execute=concat(bianryp,parguments)
| fieldsRemove  binary, arguments, parent,bianryp, parguments
| fieldsAdd policy_name=process_kprobe[policy_name]
| fieldsAdd function_name=process_kprobe[function_name]
| fieldsAdd args=process_kprobe[args]
| summarize count(), by:{function_name,policy_name}

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| parse log, "JSON:json_log"
| fieldsAdd process_kprobe = json_log[process_kprobe]
| fieldsAdd process = process_kprobe[process]
| fieldsAdd parent = process_kprobe[parent]
| fieldsAdd pod = process[pod]
| fieldsAdd namespace = pod[namespace]
| fieldsAdd podname = pod[name]
| fieldsAdd containers = pod[container]
| fieldsAdd containername = containers[name]
| fieldsAdd workload_kjnd = pod[workload_kind]
| fieldsRemove pod, containers
| fieldsAdd binary = process[binary], bianryp = parent[binary]
| fieldsAdd arguments = process[arguments], parguments = parent[arguments]
| fieldsAdd process_execute = concat(binary, arguments), parent_execute = concat(bianryp, parguments)
| fieldsRemove binary, arguments, parent, bianryp, parguments
| fieldsAdd policy_name = process_kprobe[policy_name]
| fieldsAdd function_name = process_kprobe[function_name]
| fieldsAdd args = process_kprobe[args]
| filter policy_name == "tcp-recv-monitoring"

| fieldsAdd policy_name=process_kprobe[policy_name]
| fieldsAdd function_name=process_kprobe[function_name]
| fieldsAdd args=process_kprobe[args]
| filter function_name == "tcp_connect"
| fieldsAdd sock_argd=args[0]
| fieldsAdd sock=sock_argd[sock_arg]
| fieldsAdd traffic=concat(sock[saddr],":",sock[sport],"->",sock[daddr],":",sock[dport])
| fieldsRemove sock, sock_argd

grail.canonicalQuery:
fetch logs
| filter contains(log.file.path, "tetragon")
| parse log, "JSON:json_log"
| fieldsAdd process_kprobe = json_log[process_kprobe]
| fieldsAdd process = process_kprobe[process]
| fieldsAdd parent = process_kprobe[parent]
| fieldsAdd pod = process[pod]
| fieldsAdd namespace = pod[namespace]
| fieldsAdd podname = pod[name]
| fieldsAdd containers = pod[container]
| fieldsAdd containername = containers[name]
| fieldsAdd workload_kjnd = pod[workload_kind]
| fieldsRemove pod, containers
| fieldsAdd binary = process[binary], bianryp = parent[binary]
| fieldsAdd arguments = process[arguments], parguments = parent[arguments]
| fieldsAdd process_execute = concat(binary, arguments), parent_execute = concat(bianryp, parguments)
| fieldsRemove binary, arguments, parent, bianryp, parguments
| fieldsAdd policy_name = process_kprobe[policy_name]
| fieldsAdd function_name = process_kprobe[function_name]
| fieldsAdd args = process_kprobe[args]
| filter function_name == "tcp_connect"
| fieldsAdd sock_argd = args[0]
| fieldsAdd sock = sock_argd[sock_arg]
| fieldsAdd traffic = concat(sock[saddr], ":", sock[sport], "->", sock[daddr], ":", sock[dport])
| fieldsRemove sock, sock_argd
